name: Spring And Co.
description:
Story-

Welcome to your new job as a nightguard at Spring's Diner! Due to recent robberies, our CEO has placed a nightguard in every Spring location in town. We hope you enjoy your time working here!

But things aren't as they seem.

Here at Spring And Co. , we think the location that you're working at might have been robbed. The animatronics seem to be acting, strange... but don't worry! We've given you a handy flashlight and camera panel so you don't have to worry about the animatronics breaking themselves!

Or you…

Gameplay-

When you start the game, you'll see you're in a dark room. Turn on your flashlight with [SPACE] to look around your room. To your left and right, there are long hallways. Shine your light down them to see any passers by. If anything happens to be there, shocking it with [ENTER] would be recommended for survival. Swipe up to see a vent. Shine your light to see what's in it. If anything appears there, close the vent by clicking and holding down. Swipe down while facing the front to see the camera system. If you press [SPACE] again then you can turn on the camera lights. When they're on, you can monitor the movements of the animatronics. Be warned, as having your light on, having your camera on and shocking drains power. In the bottom left hand corner you can see your power percentage. If your power is less than 1, you'll be unable to use your camera system, flashlight and shock system.

Controls And Hotkeys-

Press [SPACE] to use your flashlight and camera light.

Press [ENTER] while looking left and right to shock or to close the vent.

Click to close the vent and change camera.

Drag to your left or right to change where your looking or use [WASD].

Press [1-9] to change camera or click.

Other-

Spring And Co. is not meant to offend people but if you do feel offended by it, I would recommend uninstalling it from your PC. This is a fangame of FNAF, and shouldn't be seen as something to overcome FNAF, or be seen as a ripoff and or copy.

-END-
